Reconstruction of historic states does seem to be going slower than I would have expected, taking about 5 seconds per slot, which seems really slow. At this rate it will take more than a year to reconstruct all states. Is there anything I can do to speed up the reconstruction? Would increasing heap space help? This rate is unexpectedly slow, right?
